title: Balancer - Assembly

body.body: Ensure the inner race of the roller ball bearing is supported when installing the bearing.
Position a new roller ball bearing to the balancer shaft, ensuring the circlip is positioned nearest to the drive gear.

When using a press, always wear overalls, eye face and hand protection. Objects such as bearings frequently break-up under load and the debris caused during break-up may cause damage and injury to unprotected parts of the body.
Never wear loose clothing, which could become trapped in the press and cause crushing injury to the hand, arms or other parts of the anatomy.
Using a press and press bars, fit the roller ball bearing to the balancer shaft.
Refit the washer and a new circlip to the shaft.
Lubricate and fit the needle roller bearing and install a new circlip in the same orientation as noted prior to removal.
